welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Grinon, the charming city known for its warm hospitality and picturesque landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our rich culture and delicious cuisine. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest and busiest terminal at Barajas Airport, serving both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights and some European destinations.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Barajas Airport, primarily used for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The main hub for Iberia Airlines and its partner airlines, located in a separate building connected to the other terminals by a shuttle train.

terminals.name: Terminal 4S
terminals.description: A satellite terminal connected to Terminal 4, used for long-haul flights and flights to non-Schengen countries.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Premium WiFi is also available for purchase.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Torrejon AFB Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.
